name: AnimeThemesSync
description: Enhance your anime collection by automatically downloading Opening (OP) and Ending (ED) videos from AnimeThemes.moe. Features include precise matching via AniList/MyAnimeList IDs, adding season tags (e.g., "Winter 2024"), and direct links to AnimeThemes.moe pages.
overview: Automatically downloads anime OP/ED themes from AnimeThemes.moe for your Jellyfin library.
